descriptionHtml:
Finally, Dovahkiin will honor his name with this new shout called Dragon Breath. It allows you to shout fireballs and a continuous fire stream, just like dragons do.
////////////////////////////////
Installation:
-Download manually/with manager.
-Install using Nexus Mod Manager.

It\'s a single plug-in file, so there shouldn\'t be any problems.รง
////////////////////////////////7
Using it in game:
As I would need to create a trigger that let you learn the words, I just relied on the console, because I need to improve my modding skills in order to do that. I maybe create a quest for the words.

Anyway, open the console and type:
player.teachword: ID
Change ID for the words ID\'s
-The ID are:
00051961
00020E17
0002F7BD

////////////////////
Bugs:
-If you know the three words (in other shouts, like Yol) you won\'t have to use any dragonsouls to unlock it. Otherwise, kill dragons to get souls.

-Another \"Fire Breath\" shout appears, but it\'s useless, doesn\'t have words, etc.

//////////////////////
To do list:
-Fix those bugs.
-Create a Frost version.
-Create three walls with the words
author: zalitrix
